sentences.en: A thin curl of smoke arose lazily from the cobin.
sentences.cn: 一缕薄烟懒洋洋地从小屋升起。

sentences.en: Another officer checked each ticket; a third lazily thumbed through our passports; a fourth stamped them; a fifth scanned them.
sentences.cn: 另一名官员检查每一张机票；第三位懒洋洋地用拇指检查我们的护照；第四位在上面盖章；第五位扫描。

sentences.en: Bees buzzed lazily among the flowers.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂在花丛中懒洋洋地嗡嗡叫着。

sentences.en: Bob , who had no intention of working, leaned lazily on his spade.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃不想干活, 懒洋洋地倚在铁铲上.

sentences.en: Elaine turned and waved her hand lazily and left.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩转过身，懒懒地挥了一下手就走了。

sentences.en: From the opening crawled John Mortonson's cat, which lazily leapt to the floor, sat up, tranquilly wiped its crimson muzzle with a forepaw, then walked with dignity from the room.
sentences.cn: 约翰·莫特森的猫从空隙处慢慢走了过来。 它懒洋洋地跳到平台上，端然而坐，用前掌淡定地擦了擦它深红色的鼻口，然后高贵地从房间走开。

sentences.en: Goldfish were swimming lazily in a group just under the surface.
sentences.cn: 金鱼聚在一起贴着水面懒洋洋地游着。
他动了动,懒洋洋地舒展了一下身体.

sentences.en: He walks lazily into the office and noisily closes the door.
sentences.cn: 他懒洋洋地走进办公室并且大声地关门.

sentences.en: It was very pleasant to see how things lazily adapted themselves to purposes.
sentences.cn: 有些事情慢慢发展,终于得其所哉,看了真叫痛快.

sentences.en: Kids who were sitting lazily at their desks immediately straightened up.
sentences.cn: 懒懒地倚着课桌的孩子们立刻挺直了腰板.

sentences.en: Lazily , he rolled over and rubbed his belly against the soles of the girl's shoes.
sentences.cn: 然后它懒懒地靠到林小姐的脚背上, 就林小姐的鞋底来磨擦它的肚皮.

sentences.en: Lazily he stood up, glanced at her and went over to help.
sentences.cn: 很懒的他立起来, 看了她一眼,走过去帮忙.

sentences.en: Liz went back into the kitchen, stretching lazily.
sentences.cn: 莉兹伸着懒腰返回厨房。

sentences.en: She reclined lazily on soft yielding cushions.
sentences.cn: 她懒洋洋的靠在柔软的靠垫上。
她打了个哈欠，伸了个懒腰。

sentences.en: The aromatic smoke of cooking fires floated lazily aloft.
sentences.cn: 炊烟带着诱人的香味袅袅上升,随风飘荡.

sentences.en: The Salzach river threaded its way lazily between the old city and the new.
sentences.cn: 萨尔察赫河在新城与旧城之间缓缓流过。

words.tran_cn: 懒惰的；懒洋洋的；怠惰的；慢吞吞的
懒洋洋地；怠惰地，懒散地

trans.tran_cn: 怠惰地，懒散地，慢吞吞地
